header_text: On your way out from work, you stop in the restroom. As you leave the bathroom stall, your coworker passes you and gives you a funny look. Your coworker is probably distracted.

elements.Text: Is your coworker negatively judging you as you leave the restroom?

elements.name: On your way out from work, you stop in the restroom. As you leave the bathroom stall, your coworker passes you and gives you a funny look. Your coworker is probably distracted._Social Situations_comp_question
